name: Goblin Grab
description:
This game lets you play as a goblin where you start off at his home a cave where a book gives you the options to travel to different castles to try and get the gold and then avoid the guards to  make it back to the entrance. Gold will pile up at home and you will feel like a true goblin and you can horde the gold or spend it to increase your skills at the table with the book and different levels.

                                                                            How To Play

  • Esc or Escape to get the menu
  • W,A,S,D to move around.
  • Spacebar to get the camera to rotate with the goblin
  • V to run

So please leave a comment to my video or this game to get my attention on how to improve the game. I will be updating and improving the game as time moves on. So please leave suggestions don't be afraid to express your opinions.
